TopicTitle: I can't inspect parts in my ship after i make a maneuver node

Articles.Content:
As stated in the title everything works fine i can inspect parts on my ship but once i make a maneuver node and i try to inspect a part this happens. Only thing that helps is to delete the node quicksave and then reload that quicksave but it gets tedious after a while.

as for mods i have eve,sve,svt,kopernicus,scatterer.
Welcome to the forum @KasperTheOne, your issue has been moved from console support to PC modded support.
